title: Ellen Johnson Sirleaf | Academy of Achievement

quotes: Given the two civil wars that had transpired, all the violence and the economic freefall over 25 years, this would seem to be the most difficult job in the world.
I still believe in that, and I think the progress we’ve made in these two years does support that view.

roles.title: presidential candidates
quotes: you’ll see people who were presidential candidates, vice presidential candidates, leading people in the other opposition parties and whatnot.
